meanings.definition: Relating to the period before marriage.
meanings.sent1: They attended a premarital counseling session to prepare for their upcoming wedding.
meanings.sent2: It is common for couples to discuss premarital agreements before tying the knot.
meanings.sent3: The premarital class taught them valuable communication skills for their future together.
meanings.sent4: Their premarital journey was filled with excitement and anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The premarital period allowed them to strengthen their bond before marriage.

meanings.sent1: The premarital retreat helped them deepen their connection before the wedding.
meanings.sent2: They decided to seek premarital counseling to address any potential issues early on.
meanings.sent3: Their premarital adventures included planning the perfect proposal.
meanings.sent4: The premarital phase of their relationship laid a strong foundation for their future together.
meanings.sent5: They cherished the premarital moments leading up to their special day.
